author: billbarker
msg: This has no effect on existing 3.3.x code, but Coyote explodes without it.  Doing this now will allow people to test Coyote against a released version.

author: billbarker
msg: Port of Remy's change in j-t-c.
This does nothing to the current 3.3.x code (since nobody calls it), but needs to be here for people testing j-t-c code against 3.3.x.

author: larryi
msg: Add "ajpid12" and "ajpid13" arguments to specify the file and protocol with
a single pair of arguments.  This also makes it possible to use the same
arguments to specify the ajpid file and protocol at startup and shutdown.

author: larryi
msg: Add a check for "ajpid12" ContextManager property and if found, use it to
override the ajpidFile.  This allows the ajpid file to be set with command
Also added a "shutdownEnable" attribute in addition to the less intuitive
